Surrapa| undergrad = 240| postgrad = 00| free_label = Acronym|iitrpr free = IIT RN| city = [[Rupnagar]] | state = [[Punjab (India)|Punjab]] | country = [[India]] | colors = | campus = 520 acres| website = http://www.iitrpr.ac.in| }} The '''Indian Institute of Technology Ropar''' (had its first year at [[IIT Delhi]] and currently functional at its transit campus in Ropar), forms a part of the league along with 15 (7 existing, 8 proposed) other [[Indian Institutes of Technology|IITs]] in [[India]]. The seven old IITs are located in [[Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur|Kharagpur]], [[Indian Institute of Technology Bombay|Bombay]], [[Indian Institute of Technology Madras|Madras]], [[Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur|Kanpur]], [[Indian Institute of Technology Delhi|Delhi]], [[Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati|Guwahati]], and [[Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee|Roorkee]]. With the plan to setup eight more IITs in the states of [[Rajasthan]], [[Bihar]] ([[Patna]]), [[Andhra Pradesh]] ([[Hyderabad, India|Hyderabad]]), [[Himachal Pradesh]] ([[Mandi]]), [[Orissa]] ([[Bhubaneshwar]]), [[Madhya Pradesh]] ([[Indore]]), [[Gujarat]] ([[Gandhinagar]]) and [[Punjab (India)|Punjab]] ([[Rupnagar]]), the total number of IITs will be increased to 15. ==History== This new institute was established by [[Ministry of Human Resource Development (India)|Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD)]] of the [[Government of India]] in year 2008. The proposed location for IIT Punjab is Birla seed Farms, [[Rupnagar]], district headquarter of [[Punjab (India)|Punjab]] near to [[Chandigarh]]. The classes for academic session 2008-2009 were held at [[IIT Delhi]]. Foundation stone of IIT Punjab was laid down on 24th feb, 2009 by former Union HRD Minister Mr. Arjun singh. Second year onwards IIT Punjab students has been shifted to its temporary campus (a former women's polytechnic) which is provided by the govt. of punjab. Classes are being held in its temporary campus i.e former women's polytechnic Ropar till its own main campus gets ready. Renovation of temporary campus is going on at pace and IIT Delhi administration had promised to make the campus ready for second year students and coming freshers before the beginning of academic session 2009-2010. Second academic session of IIT Punjab started from 20th of august, 2009. Curriculum for rest of the semesters has been announced to students on the day of their registration. ==Location== IIT Ropar is located at Rupnagar (formerly known as [[Ropar]]) town of the district Roopnagar. Roopnagar was founded in the 11th century and named after Rup Sen son of Raja Rokeshar. Recent excavations and explorations conducted at Roopnagar indicate that the first settlements here were the [[Harappan]]s, who reached the upper [[Satluj]] towards the close of third millennium B.C. The district has rich historical and religious significance. Roopnagar town, the district headquarters is 42 km. from [[Chandigarh]], the state capital. Roopnagar is well connected by road on [[Indian National Highways|National Highway]] [[NH-21]]. The [[Delhi]]-[[Ambala]]-[[Una, Himachal Pradesh|Una]] railway line passes through Roopnagar and provides good [[Rail transport|rail]] connectivity. The nearest [[airport]] is at Chandigarh at a distance of about 60 km. The [[Satluj]] river passes close to Roopnagar. ==Director== Director for IIT Punjab has been announced by the government of India and the confirmed director is Dr. M. K. Surrapa who was a professor in dept. of metallurgy in IISc Bangalore. He has joined IIT Ropar since the beginning of academic session 2009-2010 at Ropar. ==Academic Programs== In its first year, i.e. academic year 2008-2009, three undergraduate programmes were offered. Admission to these programmes is through the JEE and students are admitted after completing 10+2 schooling. *Bachelor of Technology in [[Computer Science and Engineering]] *Bachelor of Technology in [[Electrical Engineering]] *Bachelor of Technology in [[Mechanical Engineering]] IIT Ropar also invited admissions for Ph.D. in Mechancial Engg., Electrical Engg., [[Physics]], [[Chemistry]], [[Mathematics]] and [[Philosophy]] from 2009 sessionhttp://www.iitd.ac.in/iitrpr/Admission.htm. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.iitd.ac.in/iitrpr/ IIT Punjab official site] *[http://www.iitd.ac.in/ IIT Delhi (Mentor Institute for IIT Punjab)] *[http://www.iitpunjab.co.cc/ IIT-Punjab Blog by Students] *[http://wikimapia.org/13157180/IIT-Punjab-Temporary-Campus IIT Punjab Temporary Campus@Wikimapia] *[http://wikimapia.org/8643829/Birla-Farm-Ropar IIT Punjab Permanent campus] {{Indian Institute Of Technology}} {{coord missing|India}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Indian Institute Of Technology Punjab}} [[Category:Indian Institutes of Technology]] [[Category:Technical universities and colleges]] [[Category:Educational institutions established in 2008]] [[Category:Rupnagar]] [[Category:Education in Punjab (India)]] [[hi:भारतीय प्रौद्योगिकी संस्थान]]
